entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
